feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 3:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain mixed with freezing rain near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. High 9 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain changing to a few flurries near noon. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 9 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
